metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1757 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in all undertow-2.x.x SP1 versions prior to undertow-2.0.30.SP1, all undertow-1.x.x and undertow-2.x.x versions prior to undertow-2.1.0.Final, where the Servlet container causes servletPath to normalize incorrectly by truncating the path after semicolon which may lead to an application mapping resulting in the security bypass.

criterions.comment: undertow package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
